pages.text: $(li)The Yak is a creature similar to the Cow that can be found in Mountains.$(br)$(li)The Yak can be right clicking while you are holding an Empty Bucket to get a Bucket of Milk.$(br)$(li)You can right click on one Yak while you are holding Shears in your hand to obtain Yak Hair.
Be careful, because the sheared Yak will attack you immediately after doing this.
$(li)Yaks may drop Raw Beef or Yak Hair on death.
